sentence.Network_en: Tossing three quarters of a million light - heartedly to a friend that way.
sentence.Network_cn: 就那样随随便便地把七十五万英镑扔给了一个朋友.

sentence.Network_en: I walked light - heartedly down Heavenly Street, like a man without a care in the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 我走在天街上,轻松愉快, 像一个没事人一样.

sentence.Network_en: He light - heartedly overlooks some of the basic facts of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他轻易地忽略了一些基本生活事实.
